/.title: Inagamjanov
h3: Software Engineer (iOS, Android, Backend, Map SDK)
p: I’m a passionate and adaptable software engineer with over four years of experience bringing ideas to life through mobile  (iOS & Android) and backend development. I love turning complex challenges into simple, high‑performing solutions that people enjoy using. Over the years, I’ve worked on everything from building custom Map SDKs that rival top industry platforms to creating backend systems trusted to run with 99.9% uptime.

I’m naturally curious and always eager to learn something new. Whether I’m leading a project from the ground up or working closely with a team, I aim to create scalable, reliable, and meaningful products that make a real difference for users.

Designed and developed a robust, cross-platform Map SDK for iOS and Android—on par with Yandex SDK and Google Maps SDK—enabling third-party developers to seamlessly integrate advanced mapping features into their applications.  Architected and implemented native iOS and Android mobile applications featuring interactive map views; real-time WebSocket chat and friends networking; high-performance point-of-interest (POI) search; and curated modules for tourist attractions, landmarks, and other points of interest.

The goal of programmatic marketing is to increase the price of the NCC token, support "Blockchain Relictum", increase the number of users, and teach what the NCC token is. The program, how marketing works for our users, consists of explaining to users the requirements and conditions for working with marketing.

Discover a new era of earning potential with Earn Up, the flagship app of the NetBoxO ecosystem, available now on the Play Market. Immerse yourself in a unique Watch-To-Earn system that transforms the way you interact with advertisements into a lucrative opportunity.

Miner UP is a cutting-edge cryptocurrency mining mobile app available on the Play Market. Unleash the power of your smartphone to mine popular cryptocurrencies effortlessly. With a user-friendly interface, real-time mining statistics, and seamless integration with various mining pools.

You have the option to receive notifications that will keep you updated about your daily quotes, ensuring that you never miss them. Additionally, you can also view these quotes in real-time on various widgets, allowing for an interactive and engaging experience.
Led the end-to-end development of a cross-platform mapping project, from requirements gathering and architecture through to release and ongoing maintenance.
Designed and built a robust Map SDK for iOS and Android—on par with Yandex SDK and Google Maps SDK—enabling third-party developers to integrate advanced mapping features seamlessly.

Architected and implemented native iOS and Android applications featuring interactive map views; real-time WebSocket-based chat and friends networking; high-performance point-of-interest (POI) search; and curated modules for tourist attractions and landmarks.
Developed backend infrastructure in Python, exposing RESTful APIs, persisting data in MongoDB, and managing real-time events via WebSockets to ensure responsive and reliable functionality.
Deployed and configured the backend on Linux servers, establishing a stable, scalable environment that supports regular use by a growing user base.

The mobile application development project was successfully completed, covering the entire application lifecycle. The application was released for iOS and Android platforms. The backend infrastructure was developed using Python, using REST API, MongoDB, and WebSocket technologies to ensure robust and efficient functionality. Finally, the application was installed on a Linux server to ensure stable and reliable operation. And it is now being used regularly by many users.
